Ok, to start this disscussion off, THe characters have amazing abilities,
almost all of them have the skills to be good strong team mates, but i think
to add a real good challenge to the game, We shuold balance the existing
(and new) characters so that each one is balanced.

FOr Example, a cleric who can heal can also make his own army of skeletons,
ghosts, and ressurect, he has more skills then some of the other characters,
such as an orc and barbarian who only have 2 skills.  we need to balance
this down, so that a barbarian can have just as many special attacks as a
cleric, or to make the game real interesting (and in my opinion, Challenging
and fun), nerf the characters back down and reduce skills so that it is
balanced with basic skills as the orc or barbarian.  Also, what we need to
change are Caps to skills and stats that each character has.  For example, a
mage should have a limit to the amount of strengh he/she has, otherwise,
what would be the point of a fighter who would have the same strength and no
magic power at all.  we should nerf the mages strength so it has a weak
physical attack, but keep a high cap for intellegence and charisma. we
should have increased effects of special attacks by lv, and finally, we
should actually gain skills and stat points by experience and not by gold,
because realistically, you can't buy those kinds of skills through money,
but by killing the creatures and enemies, and getting the experience, it
would seem that your practicing your characters skills, and as they raise by
lv (or Usage of the skill), attacks would be more effective.

and who says i don't participate in these conversations, =)

Subject: [gladiator] Wish List Part 2


Ok, this the part we can express how we would like existing characters
and their actions changed.  Part 3 will be about suggested new
characters.  Part 4 wil be about features for Gladiator:Beyond
Freedom.

Why bother?  In the off chance that the gladiator folks get back
together and start to work on Gladiator.

I will start with a couple of points:

1)when all the opponents are defeated and all enemy generators are
destroyed, all characters SHOULD stop using any attacks.

2)your teammates should be, when they reach a certain experience
level, smart enough to destroy enemy trees that are blocking their
path.
